item.title: Cluster Site Health State
item.description: A healthy cluster should have two online Trustgrid nodes in a healthy state. The Trustgrid control plane can monitor the member nodes and generate events when their state changes such that the health of the cluster is impacted. Basics These events are based on the information reported by each member node to the control plane. Because of this: There can be a delay between a change and the Cluster Site Health events.
